(C) Water levels: Very low water levels up to spawning period. High water levels during spawning period.
(D) Spawning distribution: Chums observed spread out up to falls but hard to count due to dark colour of water during high falls (tea colour).
(H) recommended enhancement: Chinooks enhanced by Nitinat Hatchery. EFFORT NEEDS TO BE PUT INTO ASSESSMENT OF SOUTH FORK FOR COHO, CHUM, AND CHINOOK.
(I) Habitat change: Accelerated bedload deposition in the lower reaches of the south fork.
(K) Additional comments: Observations made by Nitinat Hatchery, NTC biologist, and Fishery Officers.
